ol.li: Create Your Products: Set up flexible coworking options for your clients:
Business Address ‚Üí subscription product for a registered business address.

Set Pricelists: Create a pricelist for unlimited members, for example: 100% discount on coworking days, 20% off meeting rooms, and 10% off event space rentals.
Assign Membership Levels Automatically
Set the product type to Service ‚Äì Membership / Partnership for subscription offers (Business Address and Unlimited monthly access).
Link each product to its corresponding Membership Level.

Automate Renewals: For recurring plans like Business Address or Monthly Unlimited Memberships, activate automatic renewal using the Subscriptions module.
Manage Cancellations: Set an end date for the subscription to close automatically, or allow clients to cancel anytime via their Odoo portal.
Use Loyalty Cards for Day Pass Packs
Create a product ‚Äú10-Day Coworking Card‚Äù.
Go to Discount & Loyalty and create a new Loyalty Card.
Set a Loyalty Rule to give 10 points when the product is purchased.

Set a Reward where 1 point = 100% discount on 1 coworking day.
